name: Speed (itch) (S1MI)
description:
A PC version of the card game speed.

The objective: finish all your cards.

How: Blue player use arrows+enter and red use wasd+shift, move around the curser with arrows/wasd and select/place with enter/shift. you have to select 1 out of your 4 avalable cards and place in the middle, you can place if a card is greated/lower by 1 from the card in the middle, when no one can place a card the game with drew a card from your deck to the middle.

There are both singleplayer and 2 player modes, singleplayer has a human blue player and a bot red player and only arrows+enter as keys and you can choose the difficulty of the bot. while 2 player has all keys and is played with 2 players, no difficulty option.

Have fun!
